entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Elections 2002/2. The voting preferences of the adult population before the second round of the 2002 Hungarian parliamentary elections.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F33: TÁRKI Elections 2002/2. The voting preferences of the adult population before the second round of the 2002 Hungarian parliamentary elections.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Gazsó, Tibor
Kolosi, Tamás
Tóth, István György
entry.dcterms:description: party preferences, voting behavior in the first and second round, evaluation of Prime Minister candidates, voting intentions
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political institutions, public administration
entry.dcterms:coverage: the Parliamentary electoral districts of Hungary where there was a second round in 2002
entry.dcterms:subject: person
survey data
cross-section

Quota-based stratified random sample. At the first stage settlements were selected based on their size and the size of the county, where streets were randomly selected as starting points. Interview was made in every fourth flat. In the household the respondent was selected based on a quota considering age, education and gender.
face-to-face interview
D (after 2007-05-01: A)
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
